urls.title: Pet Travel | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant permits traveling with pet dogs & cats on flights within the contiguous 48 states and Puerto Rico. Pet travel requirements, fees and pet carrier information.

data.text: @HannnahF Hi Hannah! Your pup is so adorable! As much as we would love to have him on board, our current pet policy states that pets must be able to fit inside a  9”H x 16”W x 19”D carrier. https://t.co/OjNJjqJadt -H

urls.title: Terms & Conditions | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Airline Terms & Conditions on credits, refunds, itinerary changes, cancellation, taxes & fees, and no-shows.

data.text: @theshaina Hi Shaina. We are a non-refundable company per our terms and conditions. You can reference our terms and conditions here to see if you are eligible for a credit: https://t.co/4piCTDq7Ra -H

@EmilyRinggold Hi Emily. We are very sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist you. https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa -H

@thethaniel Hi Nathan. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist you. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC
-H

@tilov2 @tilov2 Hi Tiffany! Thank you for contacting Allegiant. You will need to contact TSA as your Known Traveler number was registered through TSA not Allegiant. -H
@emmytiderington Hi Emmy! We're sorry for any frustrations. Please send us a DM with your details for review. - GM

data.text: @agronomommy We're happy to know you have been helped. If you have any other questions, give us a 'tweet', hehehe. 🤣😄 - GM
@rachelle0907 If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@Micheal_Myers Hi Michael! We are so sorry for the hold time. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. We would be happy to look into it for you. - GM

@Angelala53 Hi Angie! All of our phone representatives are assisting. We have over 150 representative answering calls. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your patience is appreciated. - GM
@MJGibby We're so sorry to hear your flight was canceled! What is your flight number? - GM

@DrHollyLindberg We are so sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. Please send us a DM with your details and request. One of our team members will be happy to help. Please note, all inquires are answered in the order received. We are experiencing longer than normal hold times. - GM

@LauraRa47554331 This flight was canceled due operational needs. I apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused you. At this time you have all options available, you can cancel for a full refund/voucher, change your dates and/or cities at no additional charge. - GM

data.text: @agronomommy Unfortunately, that is not an option at this time. But send us a direct message on Twitter and we will see what we can do. Please note, all messages are answered in the order received. - GM
@LauraRa47554331 Hi Laura! We are so sorry to hear your flight has been canceled. Can you tell us the flight number? - GM

@CHRISTYreports Please note that it is at the airport agent’s discretion to issue a gate pass, and a Customer Service Representative cannot secure the pass for you. TSA may limit the number of gate passes allowed. - GM

data.text: @CHRISTYreports Gate passes can only be issued at the airport. To request a gate pass, you must ask the airport agent at the ticket counter on the day of travel. Our ticket counter will close 45 minutes before the flight’s scheduled departure. - GM

@agronomommy In order to make this change an agent over the phone must reconstruct the reservation in order to separate yourself and the children from your husband. We apologize for the hold and any frustrations you may be feeling. - GM
@KupcakeKay_ Hi Kayla! We would be happy to locate your itinerary. Can you send us a DM with your email and phone number on file. - GM
@agronomommy We're so sorry for the hold Samantha. How can we help? - GM
@rachelle0907 We completely understand, and we will be sure to share your feedback. We would be happy to answer any questions you may have. - GM

@rachelle0907 We are so sorry for the hold time, Rachelle. We are experiencing higher than normal hold times due to but not limited to, flight cancellations, weather cancellations, weather advisories, etc. Your patience is appreciated. - GM
@_DaisyBlaine Hi Daisy! We're sorry to hear this. What is the flight number? - GM
@Vint_Bimr_Drvr We're happy to hear you have all been rescheduled. We apologize for the delay in response as all messages are answered in the order received. - GM
@AllieMarie_E We're sorry for the delay! We have reached back out to you now. - GM
@Vint_Bimr_Drvr We're sorry to hear your flight was canceled. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your details. - GM
@jandrewschulze We are so sorry to hear the call was disconnected. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your request. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

-SW

@tiersha_dawn Hi Cara, thank you for contacting Allegiant. As a carrier, we make a continuous effort with every departure and arrival to try and abide by the schedule we originally plan for. Canceling is an absolute last option for us. -N
@Katefrew Hi, Kate. All inquiries are answered in the order received. We truly appreciate your patience! -N

data.text: @amanda_piersza @prabhi_prabhas Hi Amanda, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry you feel that way. If you have an Allegiant World MasterCard, you have access to a designated phone line for our members only. The number was provided in your welcome packet. Sorry for any frustration. -N
@JustRah80 Hi Sarah, thank you for contacting Allegiant. Please feel free to DM us with your questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

@prabhi_prabhas @amanda_piersza Thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and can be reached at 702-505-8888 (our only number). For the shortest wait time, we encourage you to contact us during 'off-peak' hours, which is typically from 9 pm - 4 am PT. -N
@GailRizzo2 Hi Gail, thank you for contacting Allegiant. All inquiries are answered in the order received. We appreciate your patience. -N

@kathystotler Hi Kathy, thank you for contacting Allegiant. Please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file if you are still needing assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

data.text: @CurranWrites Thanks for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear that you are having trouble booking your trip. If you are experiencing issues, try using a desktop/laptop computer and Google Chrome web browser. Make sure that you clear your cache and cookies on your browser. -N

domain.name: States
domain.description: States, provinces, or prefectures, like California or Fukushima Prefecture

data.text:
What better way to start your day than with THREE new nonstop routes just in time for summer?? 

💙 Des Moines, IA  ➡ New York City, NY/ Newark, NJ
🧡 Idaho Falls, ID ➡ Santa Ana/ Orange County, CA
💛 Las Vegas, NV ➡ Orlando/ Sanford, FL

📸:  ksavspotter https://t.co/UboIzpirWV

Serving as an Inflight Base Supervisor for two airports might seem like a lot, but it's all in a day's work for Greg. He's responsible for supporting our Inflight crew at Allegiant's bases in both Phoenix-Mesa and Los Angeles, as well as supervising both airports' operations. https://t.co/4lk6cssRJE

It's that time again. Let's see if you can #NameThatAirport! 

Hint: This year, this airport is celebrating 75 years of service! 🥳🎉 https://t.co/vsbTH8u18D

A little desert sun is always in season.

📸: valleyplanespotting https://t.co/QjifwaV0dz

urls.title: Top Ten Safest Low-Cost Airlines for 2022 - Airline Ratings
urls.description: AirlineRatings.com. the world’s only safety, product, and COVID-19 rating agency, has listed its top ten safest low-cost airlines for 2022 from the 385 airlines it monitors. Low-cost carriers (LCCs) have allowed millions of people to travel for the first time or to take trips they would otherwise be unable to afford. The AirlineRatings top 10 […]

data.text:
Allegiant is one of the safest low cost airlines in the world, according to experts at https://t.co/IaDa6TsVtf, the world's only safety, product, and COVID-19 rating agency. 

See the "Top 10 Safest Low Cost Airlines for 2022" list: https://t.co/Pwki7lSuE2.
